scripts.build: npm run build -w @mariozechner/pi-tui && npm run build -w @mariozechner/pi-ai && npm run build -w @mariozechner/pi-agent-core && npm run build -w @mariozechner/pi-coding-agent && npm run build -w @mariozechner/pi-mom && npm run build -w @mariozechner/pi-web-ui && npm run build -w @mariozechner/pi-proxy && npm run build -w @mariozechner/pi
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "ai,agent,coding-agent,mom,web-ui,tui,proxy" --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow,red,white,green,magenta,blue" "npm run dev -w @mariozechner/pi-ai" "npm run dev -w @mariozechner/pi-agent-core" "npm run dev -w @mariozechner/pi-coding-agent" "npm run dev -w @mariozechner/pi-mom" "npm run dev -w @mariozechner/pi-web-ui" "npm run dev -w @mariozechner/pi-tui" "npm run dev -w @mariozechner/pi-proxy"
scripts.check: biome check --write . && npm run check --workspaces --if-present && tsgo --noEmit
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -ws --no-git-tag-version && node scripts/sync-versions.js && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor -ws --no-git-tag-version && node scripts/sync-versions.js && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.version:major: npm version major -ws --no-git-tag-version && node scripts/sync-versions.js && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run check
scripts.publish: npm run prepublishOnly && npm publish -ws --access public
scripts.publish:dry: npm run prepublishOnly && npm publish -ws --access public --dry-run
